subsection_content: Hepatitis occurs when liver tissue cells become inflamed and damaged, reducing liver function. There are many causes of hepatitis such as viruses, drugs, alcohol, fungi, fatty liver, genetic diseases or unhealthy living habits... If not detected and managed promptly, hepatitis can occur. leading to cirrhosis, liver failure, liver cancer, and even death.(1)
subsection_title: benh viem gan.json. What is hepatitis?
subsection_data:
benh viem gan.json. What is hepatitis?
Hepatitis occurs when liver tissue cells become inflamed and damaged, reducing liver function. There are many causes of hepatitis such as viruses, drugs, alcohol, fungi, fatty liver, genetic diseases or unhealthy living habits... If not detected and managed promptly, hepatitis can occur. leading to cirrhosis, liver failure, liver cancer, and even death.(1)
